title: Don’t Mess with Patents, Biden | Guests: Sen. Josh Hawley & Rep. James Comer | 5/6/21
description:
Is the White House trying to interfere with the census? Rep. James Comer shares his insight. North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson joins to talk about his fight against critical race theory indoctrination in education. Glenn breaks down how far equity is from equality. The Biden administration now supports stripping pharmaceutical companies of their vaccine patents. Sen. Josh Hawley calls in to review his new book, "The Tyranny of Big Tech," after Facebook upheld its ban on Trump. A photo of the Bidens and Carters has gone viral. Filmmaker Ami Horowitz stops by to talk about his newest video, where he asked leftists on the street about taxing the rich. Ami and Glenn discuss how damaging class warfare can be to a country.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
